MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:54pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to locate and repair an underground cable fault on Brackenhill Drive affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:47pm on Monday, 8th March 2021
